description: The Manx government is being asked to say when key works to prevent future flooding will be carried out.
title: Laxey flooding: Island resident urges action on review
title_page: Laxey flooding: Island resident urges action on review - BBC News
maintext: Chair of Garff Commissioners, Jamie Smith said the report was "excellent" but he wanted government to put forward dates for works so it was possible to "call them to task on progress".
